process.title: Identify Gaps & Learning Needs
process.description: The outcome of the assessment places each child on the level they are required to work towards or exceed

process.title: Learning Plan Creation & Recommendation
process.description: Develop a tailored learning plan that aligns with the child’s goals, strengths, and areas for improvement

process.title: Assessment (Baselines)
process.description: We use diagnostic tests / assessments to evaluate every child’s current skill level and learning style

process.title: Match Child to Best Tutor
process.description: Tutoring using a child-centered approach we ensure each lesson is educative engaging & fun
